external_games.name: Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot Collector's Edition

name: Whispered Secrets: Tying the Knot - Collector's Edition
storyline: A typical carriage ride quickly takes a shocking turn when you encounter a cloaked criminal attacking a bride at the Osmont estate! With only one witness, a family full of secrets, and a mystical presence working against you, can you stop the horrors of the past from setting fire to the present?
summary: A typical carriage ride quickly takes a shocking turn when you encounter a cloaked criminal attacking a bride at the Osmont estate!
